donorportal-login-text: Please enter your email to receive a link to access your account
donorportal-boldtext: Thank you for playing a vital role in keeping Wikipedia free, neutral and accessible for everyone in the world.
donorportal-greetingtext: Thank you for playing a vital role in keeping Wikipedia independent, ad-free, and available for all.
donorportal-feedbackrequest: We’re currently testing this feature and would love to hear what you think.
donorportal-smalltext: Your support helps ensure that Wikipedia remains reliable, ad-free, and available for all.
donorportal-recurring-next-amount-and-da: Your next donation is for $1 $2 on $3.
donorportal-last-amount-and-date: Your last donation was for $1 $2 on $3.
donorportal-update-donation-paypal-disab: Your recurring donation is processed via PayPal. Changes to your gift must be made directly through your PayPal account.
donorportal-update-donation-problem-log-: If you did not receive an email with your login link, please ensure that the email address you used is the same address used for your donation(s) to the Wikimedia Foundation.
If you’re still unable to log in to your donor account, $1, who will be happy to assist you.
donorportal-update-payment-method-explan: We are working on a feature that will enable you to change or update your payment method directly from your donor account.

In the meantime, if you need to change your payment method (including updating your credit card), our Donor Relations team would be happy to help you. Please click $1 to complete a ‘Request to change payment method’ email template and we will respond as soon as possible.

To help us process your request, please review the information below before sending this email.%0D%0A%0D%0APlease do not include your credit card number or other financial information when contacting us.%0D%0A%0D%0ARequest to change payment method%0D%0A%0D%0AI would like to change my payment method. Please find my information below:%0D%0AName: $1%0D%0AEmail address: $2%0D%0AAmount and currency of donation: $3
donorportal-endowment-short: Donations you make to the Wikimedia Endowment will show here.
donorportal-endowment-explanation: The Wikimedia Endowment is a long-term security fund that helps protect Wikipedia now and into the future. Making a gift today is the simplest way to ensure that Wikipedia remains strong and stable, always there when you need it.
donorportal-endowment-learn-more: Learn more about the Wikimedia Endowment
donorportal-undefined-route: The page requested does not exist, please contact $1.
donorportal-pause-recurring-subheading: We understand that things change, and we'd love to help find a solution that works for you. Please select an option below.
donorportal-pause-recurring-specify-dura: Choose how long you'd like to pause your donation for:
donorportal-pause-recurring-confirmation: Thank you - see you again soon!
Your recurring donation has been paused and will resume on $1
donorportal-something-wrong: Something is wrong, please check your input
donorportal-cancel-recurring-other-ways-: Before you confirm, here are some ways to make your donation more manageable.
We understand that things change, but we'd love you to consider pausing or changing your donation if you're able to continue supporting our work.
A monthly gift is the most effective way to sustain Wikipedia for the long term and help us plan for the future.
No gift is too small to make an impact.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-pause-alter: Need to take a break? Choose how long you'd like to pause your donation for.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-frequency-a: If you'd like to give less frequently switching to an annual donation is a great way to keep giving to support our long-term future.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-amount-chan: You are free to change how much you give to us at any time.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-confirmatio: Please confirm you wish to cancel the recurring donation below.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-request-for: Can you please tell us why you wish to cancel today?
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-fina: I am cancelling for financial reasons.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-dona: I prefer to choose how often I donate.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-pref: I prefer to donate via another giving method.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-canc: I no longer wish to support the Wikimedia Foundation.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-reason-unin: I created this donation by mistake.
donorportal-cancel-recurring-confirmatio: Thank you for all your support! We're sorry to see you go.
donorportal-cancel-monthly-recurring-con: Your $1 donation has been cancelled. Please note that it may take up to 30 minutes for the cancellation to appear on your donor account.
donorportal-cancel-annual-recurring-conf: Your $1 annual donation has been cancelled. Please note that it may take up to 30 minutes for the cancellation to appear on your donor account.
donorportal-update-recurring-heading: Upgrade or change your recurring donation amount
donorportal-update-recurring-text: Your support helps ensure that Wikipedia remains reliable, ad-free, and available whenever you need it.
donorportal-update-recurring-new-donatio: Your new donation amount will apply on your next donation date of $1
donorportal-update-recurring-annual-conv: Thank you for choosing an annual donation!
Your donation will help sustain Wikipedia’s long-term future.
I'll give yearly, but keep my current amount of $1
I'll give yearly, but for a different amount:
Your new yearly donation amount will apply from your next donation date of $1.
donorportal-update-recurring-yearly-conv: Your monthly donation has been changed to a yearly donation.
donorportal-update-recurring-confirmatio: Thank you for your ongoing support
Your new donation of $1 will be debited on $2.
donorportal-aside-fun-fact: Wikipedia receives almost 16 billion views every month and is available in more than 300 languages and counting!
donorportal-donations-disclaimer: Please note that these are donations associated with your email address $1. Prior donations made via other methods or associated with different emails may not be shown. Should you have any questions regarding your donations please reach out to our team at $2
donorportal-tax-disclaimer: The Wikimedia Foundation is an international nonprofit organization that supports local and independent associations around the world. Our tax-exempt status varies according to the laws of each country. Donations to the Wikimedia Foundation are likely not tax-deductible outside the USA. If you have any questions about tax exemptions or reductions, we invite you to contact $1
emailpreferences-new-link-sent: We will send you a new link shortly. Please check your inbox.
emailpreferences-footer-learn_more: Learn more about local chapters and their projects.
emailpreferences-footer-questions_email: If you have any questions, please email donate@wikimedia.org.
emailpreferences-footer-text_license: Text is available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License; additional terms may apply. See Terms of Use or Privacy Policy for details.
emailpreferences-send-email: I love hearing from the Wikimedia Foundation, send me everything!
emailpreferences-success: Your request to save your e-mail preferences has been submitted.
emailpreferences-verify-email-sent: We’ve sent a confirmation link to your new email address.
recurupgrade-amount-ask: Please, select the amount by which you’d like to increase your gift:
recurupgrade-ask-bigger: Let’s make an even bigger impact—together.
recurupgrade-ask-heading: Wikipedia is the internet we were promised, and your support keeps it strong!
recurupgrade-ask-thankyou: Thank you for being a vital part of Wikipedia and the Wikimedia projects. Your monthly gift helps ensure that Wikipedia remains reliable, ad-free, and available whenever you need it.
recurupgrade-current-amount-and-date: Right now, your monthly donation is $1 with your next contribution scheduled for $2.
recurupgrade-small-increase: A small increase today helps keep Wikipedia strong for you and millions of others.
recurupgrade-salutation-no-recur-records: Hi! Thank you for your support to Wikipedia.
recurupgrade-no-recur-records: Unfortunately, we were unable to locate a recurring donation to upgrade. You can start a new monthly donation or contact us for support on $2.
recurupgrade-select-option: To upgrade your monthly gift, select one of the options above.
recurupgrade-thanks-increasing: Thank you for increasing your contribution and helping to build a strong, stable future for Wikipedia and all Wikimedia knowledge projects. Together, let’s spread knowledge even further.
recurupgrade-thanks-monthly: Thank you so much for being one of our rare monthly donors.
recurupgrade-upgrade-decline: No, I'll leave it as is
recurupgrade-upgrade-decline-long: If you changed your mind, feel free to close this page. Thank you again for your support!
recurupgrade-upgrading-new-amount: You are increasing your monthly donation amount to .
recurupgrade-upgrading-new-amount-and-da: Your new monthly donation amount of $1 will apply on your next donation date of $2
fundraiserunsubscribe: Unsubscribe from Wikimedia Foundation fundraising email
fundraiserunsubscribe-confirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe
fundraisersubscribe-appeal-text-001: We want to send you occasional updates with photos like these, ways to provide support or advice in the future, and more of what you love from Wikipedia.
